Author: versperalaxis
Text: hey, i’m sorry that was the reaction. know that we care and understand the struggle, you’re not alone.  honestly, i’d be careful about people like this. he may be great overall, but non-supportive SOs can really get to you. i’m struggling rn w my BF of two years w this. hopefully you’re talking to a therapist bc he shouldn’t be the sole person to rely on, but if you can’t even tell him something like that and he won’t take a life threatening illness seriously, please reconsider your options x
